cmp: 扇 (to fan, (a measure word for doors, windows, etc.))
mng: to fan into a flame, to incite

exm.mng: to fan into a flame, to incite
to stir up emotion, to arouse sympathy, moving
incitement to subvert state power (criminal charge used to gag free speech)
exm.pyn: shān dòng diān fù guó jiā zhèng quán

exm.mng: the crime of instigating counter-revolutionary propaganda
exm.pyn: fǎn gé mìng xuān chuán shān dòng zuì

exm.mng: crime of conspiring to overthrow the state
exm.pyn: shān dòng diān fù guó jiā zuì
